Commentary: caressed through midwicket! Gosh, de Kock is in some serious form. He just leans over and nonchalantly flicks the first ball of the innings neatly through the leg side
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, FOUR runs

Commentary: Malinga's follow-up is an attempted yorker that ends up as a low full toss outside off and is tapped to cover
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, no run

Commentary: carved through backward point, de Kock coming forward and opening the face of his drive to beat point. It wasn't quite out of the middle, and kept the chasing fielder interested all the way
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, FOUR runs

Commentary: Malinga switches to round the wicket, and de Kock turns the strike over with a little push to cover
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: Malinga finds some shape away from the bat outside off, and Reeza raises his hands to leave it alone
Commentary_short: Malinga to Hendricks, no run

Commentary: Reeza steps forward to meet another outswinger with solid defence
Commentary_short: Malinga to Hendricks, no run

Commentary: de Kock is taken a little by surprise as Udana finds a little extra bounce outside off, but it's controlled down to third man
Commentary_short: Udana to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: angled right across Reeza, who shoulders arms once more
Commentary_short: Udana to Hendricks, no run

Commentary: Reeza walks into an angled push outside off, guiding the ball to third man
Commentary_short: Udana to Hendricks, 1 run

Commentary: Udara finds some bounce and carry outside off, de Kock raising his hands to leave it alone
Commentary_short: Udana to de Kock, no run

Commentary: good nip again outside off, and there's some width too, but de Kock chooses to let it go
Commentary_short: Udana to de Kock, no run

Commentary: de Kock hops to ride the bounce and collects one more down to third man
Commentary_short: Udana to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: de Kock is forward again, slicing the ball down to third man to turn the strike over
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: pushed to cover, and the call for a quick single is immediate. Good run
Commentary_short: Malinga to Hendricks, 1 run

Commentary: beaten outside off! De Kock flashed at a bit of width, but swiped under the ball
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, no run

Commentary: Malinga comes around the wicket, aiming at off stump, and de Kock presses firmly to cover
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, no run

Commentary: Malinga keeps things tight on off stump, and de Kock defends once more
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, no run

Commentary: de Kock looks to work a straight one into the leg side, but he finds mid on
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, no run

Commentary: Udana continues his good work, keeping things nice and straight to draw another defensive stroke from Hendricks
Commentary_short: Udana to Hendricks, no run

Commentary: this one strays into the pads at 129km/h, Hendricks clipping a single through square leg
Commentary_short: Udana to Hendricks, 1 run

Commentary: de Kock steps into a neat little drive, but a diving extra cover stops the shot
Commentary_short: Udana to de Kock, no run

Commentary: shaping away from the left hander outside off, and de Kock lets it go past him
Commentary_short: Udana to de Kock, no run

Commentary: de Kock fetches a low full toss from outside off into the leg side, finding just enough space for a quick single
Commentary_short: Udana to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: nice end to the over from Udana, hitting a length in the channel and giving Hendricks nothing to work with
Commentary_short: Udana to Hendricks, no run

Commentary: timing! De Kock barely seemed to hit this one, but it's raced back past Malinga, beating a diving mid on. The ball was hardly full, but de Kock finds the middle with his backfoot push
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, FOUR runs

Commentary: Malinga switches to over the stumps, beating the inside of de Kock's glance to ping him on the pad. Well outside leg
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, no run

Commentary: nudged to the left of mid on for a quick single
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: Hendricks works one off the straight into the leg side and they take on the midwicket fielder for a quick single. Kamindu's the man in that position, and he hurls in a shy with his left hand
Commentary_short: Malinga to Hendricks, 1 run

Commentary: Malinga slips in a yorker at 136km/h, de Kock digging it out back to him
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, no run

Commentary: nudged into the leg side for a single, de Kock keeping the strike
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: solid forward defensive from de Kock as Udana hones in on off stump
Commentary_short: Udana to de Kock, no run

Commentary: whipped backward of square for a single
Commentary_short: Udana to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: again Udana finds a touch of extra bounce, at decent nip too, reaching 137km/h, and Hendricks presses it to cover
Commentary_short: Udana to Hendricks, no run

Commentary: chipped to mid off! Hendricks was itching to get going, but he was just too soon into this drive. The ball just held up in the surface and stood up on him, and the chipped shot presented Malinga with a simple chance at mid off. That's Udana's first wicket in ODIs. It wasn't the slower one, and Hendricks looks suspiciously at the pitch before he trudges off. Interesting celebration from the bowler, too
Commentary_short: Udana to Hendricks, OUT
Dismissal_text: RR Hendricks c Malinga b Udana 4 (23m 11b 0x4 0x6) SR: 36.36

Commentary: there's that extra bounce again, and du Plessis takes his bottom hand off a defensive push as a length delivery rises to hit the splice
Commentary_short: Udana to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: Udana keeps it tight on off stump, du Plessis pressing forward to defend
Commentary_short: Udana to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: pushed down the ground for a quick single
Commentary_short: Rajitha to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: thumped down the ground! Du Plessis lets his bottom hand do the work to punch a full one down the ground. It has the beating of Malinga at mid on, and then rolls past a diving Mendis at the boundary
Commentary_short: Rajitha to du Plessis, FOUR runs

Commentary: pushed down the leg side
Commentary_short: Rajitha to du Plessis, 1 wide

Commentary: very full again, and du Plessis drives powerfully down the ground, presenting the full face of the bat into the shot. Kusal Perera dives at mid off, and he's clutching his knee as he stands up. Well, and he's left the field now as well, which is a little worrying for Sri Lanka
Commentary_short: Rajitha to du Plessis, FOUR runs

Commentary: du Plessis drives once again, this time pinging mid on with the shot
Commentary_short: Rajitha to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: Rajitha pulls his length back a shade after those drives, du Plessis staying deep in his crease to defend
Commentary_short: Rajitha to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: left well alone outside off
Commentary_short: Rajitha to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: a touch short from Udana, de Kock stepping back to pull to midwicket
Commentary_short: Udana to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: du Plessis steps into a good-looking drive, but finds the field
Commentary_short: Udana to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: chipped in the air! Du Plessis drives back at the bowler, and I don't think he was trying to hit it in the air, but it comes out of the middle and bounces over Udana and away for four. It wasn't the slower one, it just stuck in the pitch
Commentary_short: Udana to du Plessis, FOUR runs

Commentary: du Plessis is forward to drive to cover
Commentary_short: Udana to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: short, and pulled out to the fielder at deep square leg
Commentary_short: Udana to du Plessis, 1 run

Commentary: worked into the leg side for a quick single
Commentary_short: Udana to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: nicely bowled by Rajitha, who keeps this length delivery in the channel as de Kock defends
Commentary_short: Rajitha to de Kock, no run

Commentary: de Kock walks out at the bowler and aims an attacking swipe into the leg side, but there's protection at deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Rajitha to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: laced through cover point! Du Plessis rises to cover the extra bounce outside off, slapping firmly off the back foot
Commentary_short: Rajitha to du Plessis, FOUR runs

Commentary: angled down to short third man, Kusal Mendis jumping across from the wide slip position to stop it - but unable to stop the single
Commentary_short: Rajitha to du Plessis, 1 run

Commentary: sprayed down the leg side, de Kock getting after it with a wild pull but unable to reach the ball
Commentary_short: Rajitha to de Kock, 1 wide

Commentary: whipped into the leg side, but aimed straight at the midwicket fielder
Commentary_short: Rajitha to de Kock, no run

Commentary: powerfully pulled to deep backward square! Short from Rajitha, but it's also misdirected towards leg stump and de Kock rolls his wrists on the pull
Commentary_short: Rajitha to de Kock, FOUR runs

Commentary: the first real slower one from Udana, down to 104km/h out of the back of the hand, and du Plessis defends it into the leg side, finding space for a quick single
Commentary_short: Udana to du Plessis, 1 run

Commentary: yorker, aimed for the base of middle, and de Kock digs it out to cover
Commentary_short: Udana to de Kock, no run

Commentary: slapped in front of square! This wasn't all that short, and de Kock's pull was off the front foot, the ball going well in front of square on the leg side
Commentary_short: Udana to de Kock, FOUR runs

Commentary: slower ball, outside off, and de Kock drives to point
Commentary_short: Udana to de Kock, no run

Commentary: this one cuts in to de Kock off the track, and he works with the movement to find a single on the leg side
Commentary_short: Udana to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: full toss from Udana, and it takes du Plessis a little by surprise as he pushes to mid off
Commentary_short: Udana to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: looped up from around the stumps, pushed to mid off
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to de Kock, no run

Commentary: de Kock is back and across to defend into the leg side
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to de Kock, no run

Commentary: de Kock jumps down the track, but he's not to the pitch and hurries a defensive jab to cover
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to de Kock, no run

Commentary: again de Kock uses his feet, but he can only push it back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to de Kock, no run

Commentary: looped up on middle and off, de Kock defending to cover
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to de Kock, no run

Commentary: a neat little paddle sweep sends the ball down to fine leg for a couple
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to de Kock, 2 runs

Commentary: edged down to third man! Du Plessis flashes outside off, and a thick edge brings runs
Commentary_short: Rajitha to du Plessis, FOUR runs

Commentary: Rajitha finds the leading edge of du Plessis' defensive poke, the ball rolling through point
Commentary_short: Rajitha to du Plessis, 1 run

Commentary: on a length and straight, de Kock pushing it back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Rajitha to de Kock, no run

Commentary: a powerful drive is intercepted by a diving Thisara Perera at mid off, who aims a shy at the non-striker's end ... but there's no-one backing up, so it's an overthrow
Commentary_short: Rajitha to de Kock, 2 runs

Commentary: angled down to third man
Commentary_short: Rajitha to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: slashed up and over slip! Well, the fielder was there for a catch, but du Plessis ramps his slashed cut to send the ball well over his head
Commentary_short: Rajitha to du Plessis, FOUR runs

Commentary: walloped over wide long on! De Kock's happy feet get him down the track and right to the pitch, and who slams his shot over the infield and all the way for six
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to de Kock, SIX runs

Commentary: worked into the leg side for one
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: offbreak from Akila, and du Plessis works with the spin into the leg side
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to du Plessis, 1 run

Commentary: swept hard, but Udana in the deep keeps them to one
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: clipped firmly through square leg for one
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to du Plessis, 1 run

Commentary: good running from the pair in the middle as de Kock finds a little space on the leg side
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: decent nip from Rajitha at 140km/h, de Kock square driving out to the sweeper
Commentary_short: Rajitha to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: Rajitha strays in to du Plessis' pads, the South African skipper flicking him uppishly out to deep square leg
Commentary_short: Rajitha to du Plessis, 1 run

Commentary: he's almost taken out his captain! De Kock powers a straight drive back down the ground, and du Plessis has to take evasive action to get out of the way of it, the boundary bringing up de Kock's third fifty of the series
Commentary_short: Rajitha to de Kock, FOUR runs

Commentary: pulled down to fine leg, de Kock getting up on one leg to send the ball bouncing away with a flair and timing
Commentary_short: Rajitha to de Kock, FOUR runs

Commentary: Rajitha aims this one much fuller, de Kock flicking out to deep square leg
Commentary_short: Rajitha to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: du Plessis pushes to cover, but he can't find the gap
Commentary_short: Rajitha to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: down the ground! De Kock lofts cleanly down the ground, lifting the ball over a leaping long on fielder and raising the team hundred
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to de Kock, SIX runs

Commentary: he's forward to drive this one along the ground to cover
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: eased down to long on for a single
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to du Plessis, 1 run

Commentary: floated up on middle and leg, and he's forward to drive to long on
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: sliced down to third man! It was the legbreak from Akila, and turned away to take the outer half of du Plessis' slashing square drive. There's a slip in place, but it's well wide of him
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to du Plessis, FOUR runs

Commentary: flicked to square leg
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: glanced away, first ball! Fine leg is up, and Perera lets his first ball slip down the leg side. De Kock just needs to put bat to the leg stump half volley
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to de Kock, FOUR runs

Commentary: and again! Perera offers a gift on leg stump, and de Kock flicks him down to the same region for four more
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to de Kock, FOUR runs

Commentary: three in a row! Perera adjusts, pushing his line outside off, and de Kock crunches a drive through cover, on the up
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to de Kock, FOUR runs

Commentary: that's a better line from Perera, and de Kock is forward to defend it
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to de Kock, no run

Commentary: a leading edge squirts through mid off
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: an angled bat sends the ball bouncing straight to point
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to du Plessis, no run

Commentary: short of a length on leg stump, tapped to short fine's left off the back foot
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: has he edged that? Yes! Malinga comes back and puts a stop to the madness. Faf is cramped on the hook and can only parry this gently down leg side off the leading edge. Dickwella takes a simple catch. Malinga got that to skid on at a leg stump line and Faf's angled bat costs him
Commentary_short: Malinga to du Plessis, OUT
Dismissal_text: F du Plessis c †Dickwella b Malinga 36 (51m 27b 7x4 0x6) SR: 133.33

Commentary: and he is greeted by a bouncer. Bit too short at a middle stump line. He ducks to let it go
Commentary_short: Malinga to van der Dussen, no run

Commentary: length on middle stump, flicked to mid-on's right on the rise
Commentary_short: Malinga to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: short of a length on leg stump on leg stump, nudged through square leg off the back foot

Commentary: slow loopy full toss on the pads, stays put and tucks it to deep square

Commentary: full outside off, opens the face and pushes it to sweeper cover

Commentary: full on off stump, drives with the turn but can't beat the bowler to his right

Commentary: length on leg stump, defended to midwicket off the inside half

Commentary: tossed up at off stump, driven with the turn to extra cover
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to de Kock, no run

Commentary: full on leg stump, reverse sweep out to deep cover
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: tossed up outside off, driven down down to long-on with the turn
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: length and wide outside off, swishes at it and gets a thick outside edge to third man

Commentary: slower ball at a length just outside off, mistimed tap down the pitch on the front foot
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, no run

Commentary: slower ball at a length on off stump, pushed to extra cover's left
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, no run

Commentary: short of a length on leg stump, tapped to midwicket on the up
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, no run

Commentary: slower ball just outside off, driven firmly back at the bowler
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, no run

Commentary: length on middle stump, defended on the front foot
Commentary_short: Malinga to de Kock, no run

Commentary: short and turning away outside off, cut to sweeper cover
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: length and in at middle stump. Defended on the front foot
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to de Kock, no run

Commentary: full on off stump, reaches out for the reverse sweep, gets it straight to short third. He slowed that down - 77kph
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to de Kock, no run

Commentary: just gets bat on this reverse swat. It was a legbreak and much fuller than last ball. Wasn't there for the sweep, he had to hurriedly hit it on its head. Straight to short third
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to de Kock, no run

Commentary: length on off, tapped through the covers on the rise
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: full outside off, driven back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to van der Dussen, no run

Commentary: length on leg stump, allows it to come on, stays inside the line and tickles it past short fine. To his left. Is that a bat or a time-travel machine? Thisara with some Déjà vu
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to de Kock, FOUR runs

Commentary: no, seriously, is that a time machine? Another boundary, second ball, to short fine's right. QDK deep in the crease once more and allows it to come on. Deep backward square puts in a slide but has no chance
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to de Kock, FOUR runs

Commentary: length on middle, defended on the back foot
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to de Kock, no run

Commentary: full on off stump, pushed down the pitch, towards mid-off
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: short and wide outside off, left alone
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to van der Dussen, no run

Commentary: length outside off, punched to sweeper on the up
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: length and turning in at leg stump. Poked through square leg off the back foot
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: full on off stump, pushed down the pitch off the front foot
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to de Kock, no run

Commentary: full outside off, driven with the turn to sweeper
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: length at middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot

Commentary: full on middle, driven to long-on
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: full on off, driven uppishly to mid-off's left
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: length on the pads, clipped to fine leg
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: here we go again. Length on leg stump and he gets behind it to dab it fine. This time the fielder is back on the boundary
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: length just outside off, pushed into the covers with soft hands
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: slower ball, short and wide and spanked. Avishka leaps to his right at extra cover to stop four
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to de Kock, no run

Commentary: length on middle stump, inside edge onto pad as he looks to close the face on this
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to de Kock, no run

Commentary: length on off, tapped to mid-off on the rise
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: full on leg stump, jammed to midwicket's left

Commentary: length on leg stump, whipped to deep square off the back foot

Commentary: length outside off, slice to point on the up

Commentary: short and wide outside off, cut to extra cover's right, stopped with a dive again

Commentary: length and in at the pads, clipped to short fine's right. That was bowled left-handed

Commentary: full on off stump, blocked on the front foot
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to van der Dussen, no run

Commentary: there it is! He's waited too long. QDK finally converts. Short and wide outside off, allows it to come and chops it past point. He's mentioned it after the last game, the need to get 100 when he gets 80. After two tries, he screams. Kept his head a little when he got close this time, tightened his game, and he achieves the landmark
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to de Kock, FOUR runs

Commentary: whoops he loses shape the very next ball! So much for praising the composure. Holds his head. Knows he's made a mistake. Looks to pull this length ball from off stump and gets a leading edge that lands safely behind the bowler
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: length outside off, poked through cover on the up
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: length on leg stump, jabbed to fine leg's right
Commentary_short: NLTC Perera to de Kock, 1 run

Commentary: past the edge. Jumps up from a length as he gets forward to try and push this through the off side

Commentary: full on leg stump, flicked to midwicket's right

Commentary: full and floated up at off, driven back to the bowler

Commentary: length and in at off, tapped to extra cover off the back foot

Commentary: dropped short outside off, cut firmly to sweeper cover

Commentary: length on leg stump, clipped through square leg

Commentary: screeches this lbw appeal, and he has a case in terms of line and length. But is there an inside edge? Yes, there is. Nicely disguised slower ball at a length, looks to flick, gets an inside edge onto the pad in front of middle

Commentary: slower ball at a length on off stump, dead-batted on the front foot

Commentary: short outside off, pulled straight to midwicket

Commentary: past the edge. Another slower ball. Good length and just outside off. Jumps past the forward block

Commentary: length on off stump, blocked on the front foot

Commentary: length on off stump, blocked on the front foot

Commentary: falls over and the stumping appeal is sent upstairs. Steps out premeditatedly and is beaten in flight. This lands short of a length and he has to jump back to try and cut it. Just makes it back into the crease.

Commentary: length and in at leg stump. Poked to midwicket on the front foot

Commentary: bouncer slanted down leg, left alone

Commentary: length and in at middle stump. Defended into the leg side from the crease

Commentary: short of a length and in at middle stump. Cramps him again. Inside edge onto leg as he looks to flick

Commentary: short at off stump, swivels and pulls nicely to deep square, along the floor

Commentary: length outside off, shuffles and clips straight to mid-on

Commentary: short outside off, mistimes his cut. Gets it off the toe-end. Punches his bat in frustration and hurts himself too

Commentary: length outside off, defended to point off the front foot

Commentary: length on off stump, pushed back to the bowler

Commentary: gets low and slaps to the square leg boundary. His first boundary. And the first bad delivery from Kamindu today. Dropped short on middle stump and punished

Commentary: short of a length and wide outside off. Steps out, changes mind, gets back, leaves

Commentary: length on off stump, stabbed back down the pitch

Commentary: short of a length just outside off, hurried on the punch. Gets it pitch side off the inside half
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to van der Dussen, no run

Commentary: boom! Been a while. Length ball just outside off, gets behind the line and swings through the line to launch this flat over the bowler
Commentary_short: Rajitha to de Kock, FOUR runs

Commentary: slower ball, at a length and very wide outside off. Left alone
Commentary_short: Rajitha to de Kock, 1 wide

Commentary: over extra cover. Slow outfield and ordinary running. They get only two. Jumps into the leg side and creams this full slower ball over that fielder from off stump
Commentary_short: Rajitha to de Kock, 2 runs

Commentary: no stopping this. And it looks like Rajitha's been marked by QDK even before the game. Short of a length on leg stump, gets inside the line and drags this to the long leg boundary. Fine leg is in, so this is a good option
Commentary_short: Rajitha to de Kock, FOUR runs

Commentary: pumps it between deep square and deep midwicket. Slower ball dropped short, sitting up outside off. Walks down and smashes it, one bounce, over the boundary
Commentary_short: Rajitha to de Kock, FOUR runs

Commentary: length outside off, walks down and drives on the up, straight to extra cover
Commentary_short: Rajitha to de Kock, no run

Commentary: got him! QDK drives the momentum into the innings, but he can't keep it up past an over. Length outside off, runs down the pitch and looks to club this between mid-off and extra cover. It rises up on him and he gets an edge through to Dickwella. Rajitha has just managed to keep a part of his heel behind the stumps too. Another superb free-flowing innings from QDK, and he's given South Africa - and Miller - quite a launching pad
Commentary_short: Rajitha to de Kock, OUT
Dismissal_text: Q de Kock c †Dickwella b Rajitha 121 (131m 108b 16x4 2x6) SR: 112.03

Commentary: full on off stump, driven back to the bowler

Commentary: short of a length outside off, cut to sweeper's left

Commentary: short outside off, punched straight to sweeper

Commentary: length at off stump, defended to extra cover

Commentary: short of a length on leg stump, punched to long-on off the back foot

Commentary: very full, it's dug out to mid off and another dot ball

Commentary: past the outside edge, Miller stepping into an airy drive

Commentary: Miller walks into a firm defensive push

Commentary: flighted on middle and off, tapped back to the bowler

Commentary: Rassie cuts, the ball bursting through the hands of a diving point fielder to allow a single

Commentary: and now he switches to right-arm, Miller driving an offbreak through cover

Commentary: flighted up invitingly on off stump, and Rassie keeps the strike with a drive to long off
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to van der Dussen, 1 run

Commentary: angled down fine for a single

Commentary: slotted through cover by Miller, whose footwork is sure and left elbow high as he puts a half volley away to bring up the 200
Commentary_short: Rajitha to Miller, FOUR runs

Commentary: Miller misses his flick, but they find a single off the hip

Commentary: pushed to cover, where they take the fielder on for a quick single. The throw's wide, but Rassie was safely in at the non-striker's end

Commentary: Miller turns his wrists over a full one, picking up two straight of midwicket

Commentary: Rajitha aims very full, and Miller can't get much power in his drive to mid off

Commentary: nicely played, van der Dussen staying very deep in his crease and waiting until the very last moment to dab a late cut very fine to the third man boundary

Commentary: a touch flatter, and a nurdle finds midwicket

Commentary: pulled through square leg! Kamindu dragged this one down, and Rassie hopped back to put the pull away

Commentary: pushed to midwicket

Commentary: a checked drive brings a quick single to cover

Commentary: floated up outside off, and driven down to long off. Miller wants two, but the fielder gets it in quickly

Commentary: another single, the ball driven down to long off

Commentary: and there's his fifty, his fourth in ODIs. It comes up with a single to long off. The platform is set

Commentary: another drive, another single into the deep
Commentary_short: Dananjaya to Miller, 1 run

Commentary: pushed down the ground for one
Commentary_short: PHKD Mendis to Miller, 1 run

Commentary: van der Dussen misses a sweep at some left-arm spin, he's hit on the thigh and the appeal for lbw is upheld!. Miller suggests a review, but there's little point in it and van der Dussen trudges off even before the ball-tracking replay is completed. Plumb in front

Dismissal_text: HE van der Dussen lbw b PHKD Mendis 50 (85m 67b 3x4 0x6) SR: 74.62

Malinga to Miller, 1 run
Malinga to Pretorius, 2 leg byes

Commentary: a wide yorker slips under the bat, bouncing through to the keeper

Commentary: beaten again, and once more it's a slower one that does it

Commentary: thrashed out through cover point, Udana offering up a wide full toss and Pretorius raising the fifty stand with his second four

Commentary: slower ball, outside off, and it's chopped down to third man

Commentary: bowled by a slower ball! Brilliantly bowled, out of the back of the hand, and it dips on Pretorius at the last moment. He'd set himself for the slog sweep, but was through the shot before the ball got to him

Commentary: full, wide and it's squeezed out through point

Commentary: edged, and past Dickwella! It was another slower one, and took the edge of a poke outside off. It was never going to carry to Dickwella, but he can't get down to it in time with a dive

Commentary: and he turns the strike over with a drive to long off
Commentary_short: Malinga to Phehlukwayo, 1 run

Commentary: slower ball, and it's pushed to cover for a quick single

Commentary: worked off the hip for a quick single, and that brings up the 300

Commentary: Miller works an offcutter through midwicket, and they take on the fielder's arm for a second run

Commentary: Phehlukwayo drives but finds cover. He wants a single, but Miller doesn't

Commentary: a clubbed drive finds the sweeper in the deep, and they're back for a second

Commentary: slower one, and it's slapped to point. They take on the fielder for a sharp single, and with no-one backing up close in, his wide throw brings a second run

Commentary: no-one goes for it! Phehlukwayo swung the ball high into the air on the leg side, Rajitha and Akila converge in the deep, but each leaves it for the other. No-one called for it, no-one went for it. Either could have caught it
Commentary_short: Malinga to Phehlukwayo, 2 runs

Commentary: slapped over point! Just to rub it in, Phehlukwayo backs away and thrashes a slower ball over point
Commentary_short: Malinga to Phehlukwayo, FOUR runs

Commentary: pulled hard into the leg side, and they hustle a second run
Commentary_short: Malinga to Phehlukwayo, 2 runs

Commentary: Phehlukwayo finishes with a boundary! He walks right across to the off side, swinging wildly at a full one and top edging it up and over fine leg, the ball bouncing just short of the boundary marker
Commentary_short: Malinga to Phehlukwayo, FOUR runs
